name: Odella's Myth
description:
As future queen of Aeris, Veren must journey outside of the kingdom before she can inherit the throne. With her guardian, Kindra, the two young women learn some history of their beloved kingdom; Odella, the very first queen of the kingdom; and what things have been left to live outside of the castle walls.

Odella's Myth is a short visual novel with multiple endings. Learn about Veren, Kindra, and the secrets of the kingdom history left behind.

Written and (crudely) drawn by me, Shonté.
